cause.description:
Central Missouri Humane Society is loacted in Columbia, MO and serves the Mid-Missouri area. It was founded in 1943 and is committed to preventing cruelty and the suffering of ALL animals. They are committed to responsible pet ownership, and making the lifes and welfare of animals better through education, adoption and intervention. You can visit Central Missouri Humane Society at http://www.cmhspets.org or you can visit them in person at 616 Big Bear Blvd, Columbia, MO 65202.
1. Preventing cruelty to ALL animals.
2. Increasing the quality of life for ALL animals.
3. Promoting responsible pet ownership.
cause.mission: Support the functions of the Central Missouri Humane Society.
cause.name: Central Missouri Humane Society
